comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Harriet May Mills (1857-1935), American suffragette, New York State Hospital Commissioner. Her house in Syracuse is now on the National Register of Historic Places: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Harriet_May_Mills_House www.pacny.net/freedom_trail/Mills.htm

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: According to NYT of Aug 26, 1913, query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9F06E0DB163DE633A... this is 180 Madison Avenue, headquarters of the New York State Woman Suffrage Association. Mills was its president.

comment.author: 35014516@N03
comment._content: Thanks.  We'll add the full names for these folks next time we update the record.
